overview:
Molly Cain is the Founder and Editor-In-Chief of Glass Heel, a leading women’s career, lifestyle and networking site which launched in 2011. She is an award-winning communicator, humor columnist and Forbes contributor, specializing in topics ranging from career development, women’s issues and leadership to banking and information security. Molly’s career began in public relations and has evolved into the management of internal communications strategy for Fortune 1000 to Fortune 20 organizations in a variety of industries, including her current role as a banking executive.

Molly lives in Dallas, Texas, with her retired racing greyhounds and a never-ending desire to create. She loves to push the envelope when it needs a good shove in the right direction. Molly is a champion plate spinner (of the figurative kind), lover of good wine, golf enthusiast, destination racer, animal rescue foster mom, southpaw and expert in procrastination. It’s also been proven that she can flip a monster truck tire approximately 31 times in a row.
